subject: {{#is order_info.attributes.order_type 'SDD'}} We had to cancel your order {{else is order_info.attributes.order_type 'SDD-Mixed'}} We had to cancel your order {{else}} {{#is order_info.attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}} {{#is order_info.attributes.event_name 'ADJ_FAILED_SUBMIT_ORDER'}} We're unable to bill your insurance for COVID-19 At-Home tests, {{{order_info.customer.contact.first_name}}}! {{else}} Your COVID-19 At-Home test order was canceled {{/is}} {{else is order_info.attributes.order_type 'REFILL'}} {{#is order_info.attributes.cancel_type 'ELIGIBILITY_FAIL'}} Rx order canceled {{else}} Delivery order canceled {{/is}} {{else is order_info.attributes.order_type 'OTCHS'}} Status Update: Your order canceled {{else}} {{#if (itemFlagFinder order_info.items_being_processed 'is_pharm' 'true')}} {{#if (itemFlagFinder order_info.items_being_processed 'is_pharm' 'false')}} Delivery order canceled – Rx still available {{else}} Delivery order canceled – Rx still available {{/if}} {{else}} Status Update: Order canceled {{/if}} {{/is}} {{/is}}

content.preview_text: {{#is attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}} {{#is attributes.event_name 'ADJ_FAILED_SUBMIT_ORDER'}} You can still order tests online. {{else}} Tests are out of stock at your pickup location. {{/is}}{{else is attributes.order_type 'SDD'}}A refund is headed your way{{else is attributes.order_type 'SDD-Mixed'}}A refund is headed your way{{else is attributes.order_type 'REFILL'}} {{#is attributes.cancel_type 'ELIGIBILITY_FAIL'}} Payment was canceled for Rx order #{{order_number}}. You can still get your Rx at the store. See more details in this email. {{else}} You can still get your Rx at the store. {{/is}} {{else is attributes.order_type 'OTCHS'}} Order ##{{order_number}} has been canceled. You will not be charged. You may be able to re-order. See more details in this email. {{else}} {{#if (itemFlagFinder items_being_processed 'is_pharm' 'true')}} {{#if (itemFlagFinder items_being_processed 'is_pharm' 'false')}} Call us to redeliver your Rx or pick up in store, {{{customer.contact.first_name}}}. {{else}} Call us to redeliver your Rx or pick up in store, {{{customer.contact.first_name}}}. {{/if}} {{else}} Order ##{{order_number}} has been canceled. You will not be charged. See more details in this email. {{/if}} {{/is}}

custom.cvs_footer: Terms of Use | Privacy Policy
custom.header:
{{{{raw}}}}

{{#is attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}} {{#is attributes.event_name 'ADJ_FAILED_SUBMIT_ORDER'}} We're unable to bill your insurance, {{{customer.contact.first_name}}}! {{else}} Your pickup order was canceled, {{{customer.contact.first_name}}}. {{/is}} {{else is attributes.order_type 'REFILL'}} {{#is attributes.cancel_type 'ELIGIBILITY_FAIL'}} Your Rx payment was canceled {{else}} Delivery order canceled {{/is}} {{else}} Your order was canceled {{/is}}

{{#is attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}}{{#is attributes.event_name 'ADJ_FAILED_SUBMIT_ORDER'}} For reimbursement of At-Home COVID-19 tests, please contact your insurer. Or, you can pay out-of-pocket for them here: Order your tests {{else}} Your order was canceled because it's out of stock. We're sorry for the inconvenience. We'll make sure to reverse your claim with your insurer. {{/is}}{{else is attributes.order_type 'REFILL'}}{{#is attributes.cancel_type 'ELIGIBILITY_FAIL'}} Your prescription order is ineligible for delivery based on the insurance you have on file. Please contact your insurer for more info. {{else}} You will not be charged. We're sorry for the inconvenience. {{/is}}{{else is attributes.order_type 'OTCHS'}}You will not be charged. We're sorry for the inconvenience.{{else}}{{#isnt (itemFlagFinder item_collection.current_item_group 'is_pharm' 'true') item_collection.current_item_group.length}}{{/isnt}}
You will not be charged. We're sorry for the inconvenience.
{{#is attributes.order_type 'SDD'}}We understand this can be disappointing. You will not be charged for the order or the delivery fee.{{else is attributes.order_type 'SDD-Mixed'}}We understand this can be disappointing. You will not be charged for the order or the delivery fee.{{else}}Any CarePass® promotional rewards or ExtraBucks® Rewards used on this purchase will be reissued and can be used by sending them to your ExtraCare® card.{{/is}}
{{/is}}{{{{/raw}}}}

custom.survey:
{{{{raw}}}} {{#isnt attributes.order_type 'OTCHS'}}

Questions on your order?

Check our FAQs . {{#is attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}} {{#is attributes.event_name 'ADJ_FAILED_SUBMIT_ORDER'}} Call your insurer if you have questions. {{else}} Call your store at {{{attributes.store_phone}}} for any questions. {{/is}} {{else}} Still have questions? {{#if attributes.rx_phone_number}} {{#if (itemFlagFinder item_collection.current_item_group 'is_pharm' 'true')}} Call your pharmacy at {{{attributes.rx_phone_number}}} {{else}} Call us at 1-800-746-7287 {{/if}} {{else}} Call us at 1-800-746-7287 {{/if}}. {{/is}}

custom.legal:
{{{{raw}}}}
{{#is attributes.order_type 'OTCHS'}} The fastest and easiest way to place an order is online. To find your plan, visit: {{{attributes.web_url}}}.

{{/is}} You received this email to confirm the action noted above. {{#is attributes.order_type 'OTCHS'}} You can view the {{#isnt attributes.plan_id '11'}} OTC Health Solutions {{/isnt}} privacy policy in the footer of your plan’s webpage. For any additional questions about your {{#isnt attributes.plan_id '11'}} OTC Health Solutions {{/isnt}} order, contact us at: {{#if attributes.phone_number}} {{{attributes.phone_number}}}. {{else}} 1-888-628-2770. {{/if}} {{else}} Your email address will not be saved or used for any other purpose unless you chose to sign up for special email offers when you registered. You can change your email preference in My Account at any time. We value your privacy and the security of personal information and never give or sell any specific information about you to any manufacturer or direct marketers. If you have questions or concerns about how we protect your privacy, read our Privacy Policy. {{#is attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}}

{{#is attributes.event_name 'ADJ_FAILED_SUBMIT_ORDER'}} If you have any questions, please call your insurer. {{else}} If you have any questions about your order, please call your store at {{{attributes.store_phone}}}. {{/is}} {{else}} If you have any questions about your order, please email customercare@cvs.com or call 1-888-607-4287. {{/is}} {{/is}} {{#is attributes.pickup_location 'FRONT_STORE'}} Please note that At-Home COVID-19 tests are nonrefundable. {{/is}}

©Copyright CVS.com
One CVS Drive, Woonsocket, RI 02895
{{{{/raw}}}}
